The Period of PURPLE Crying begins at about 2 weeks of age and 
continues until about 3-4 months of age. There are other common 
characteristics of this phase, or period, which are better described 
by the acronym PURPLE. All babies go through this period. It is 
during this time that some babies can cry a lot and some far less, 
but they all go through it. See www.purplecrying.info
